Html:
Hi

I must create a formula editor for a web application in silverlight.

Can i use the " Inrony .net language implementation kit" for that and can i find some starter sample .

Sorry for my bad english.

Best regards

Irony download includes Silverlight version created by Kirill Osenkov. He uses it in his Silverlight project LiveGeometry, here's his blog about integrating Irony into Silverlight:

 

http://blogs.msdn.com/b/kirillosenkov/archive/2009/10/31/irony.aspx
